creator: Alea Srl
descriptionHtml:
***** WARNING ***************************************************************************

Push and Talk Premium includes EMERGENCY ‘Man Down’ Features.

To obtain this functionality, the application needs to send SMS from your phone account, and you'll get the Send SMS permission usage when starting the app the first time.
You have to allow this permission to activate correctly the emergency functionality.

*******************************************************************************************

Save time and improve productivity by communicating in real time with your co-workers: walkie-talkies are no longer needed thanks to Push and Talk solution.

Push and Talk is an application that uses data to connect workers, enabling communication between two or more users in a simple and intuitive way. The solution lets you:
• Communicate in an instant to everyone or to a specific group – voice, text and images.
• Use quickly without dialling, talk with one touch of a button.
• Remotely clock-in your working hours.

Push and Talk Premium includes ‘Man Down’ features.

The application detects if there is anything strange about an employee's position and starts an alarm call to the selected phone numbers.

Types of alarms for Man Down
• Immobility Alarm
• Distress (self-activated) Alarm
• Tilt Alarm

Automatic phone calls
In the case of an alarm an automated phone call is made to selected phone numbers.

Automatic SMS
A notification SMS is sent to up to 5 selected phone numbers that tells them of when an alarm starts and when it is resolved.
descriptionShort: Push and Talk: Real time communicate and use emergency detection with SMS alert
title: Push and Talk
